content: is there such a thing as  Amazon wishlist -> luzme?

Yes, there is a service called Luzme that allows you to sync your Amazon wishlist with their platform. Luzme is a website and mobile app that tracks book prices and offers price alerts for eBooks. By syncing your Amazon wishlist with Luzme, you can keep track of the prices of the books on your wishlist and receive notifications when the prices drop.
